title: Sum of Pairwise Products
text:
Given N non negative numbers, the task is to answer M queries.Each query is as follows:Given u, v you need to find the pairwise product sum (u and v are zero indexed)auau+ au+1au+1+ au+1au+ au+2au+2+ au+2au+1+ au+2au+ ... + avav+ avav-1+ ... + avauInputN
a0a1... aN-1M
u1v1u2v2...
uMvMOutputPrint the answer for each query in a separate line.ExampleInput:5
2 0 1 3 3
3
0 2
1 2
3 4Output:7
1
27Constraints0 ≤ u ≤ v < NN ≤ 100000M ≤ 1000000 ≤ ai≤ 1000000
